name: ElMar-IP Agency
tag_list: trademark, patent, industrial-design, intellectual-property, patent-attorney, trademark-attorney
overview:
ElMar-IP Agency specializes in protection of the intellectual property rights in Ukraine, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Estonia, Moldova, the Russian Federation, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan.

ElMar-IP Agency provides:

  • consultations and high quality services concerning all the areas of the intellectual property including trademarks, patents, industrial designs and other objects;

  • assistance in respect of efficient management and disposal of the intellectual property rights in such procedures as granting a license for usage or assignment of the intellectual property rights;

  • the whole range of services concerning intellectual property protection including representation before a Trademark and Patent Office, a Board of Appeal and in court procedures.
